title: Tour of the Stars' Homes - Beverly Hills
name: Tour of the Stars' Homes - Beverly Hills
description: The locations of some celebrities' houses in Beverly Hill including Desi Arnaz and Lucille Ball, Barbara Streisand, and Kirk Douglass!

properties.name: Barbra Streisand's current home
properties.description: heavily guarded and private....remember to be respectful!!

properties.name: Beverly Hills Motel - home of many a romantic encounter!!
properties.description: Said to be the site of many romantic encounters, including that of Marilyn Monroe and John F. Kennedy...

properties.name: Former Home of Lucille Ball and Desi Arnaz
Former Home of Robert Wagner and the late Natalie Wood
Former home of the late Gene Kelly
Former home of the late George Burns and Gracie Allen
Former home of the late Jack Benny
properties.description: His home was often used as the setting of his tv series..former neighbours included Lucille Ball and Desi Arnaz

properties.name: Fromer home of Jayne Mansfield
properties.description: Her pink palace with a heart shaped pool that read " I love you Jaynie" on the pools surface..

properties.name: Lana Turner's House
properties.description: This is the site of the murder of her gangster lover, Johnny Stompanato - he was stabbed to death by her daughter Cheryl Crane

properties.name: One of Elvis Presley's Former Homes
properties.description: at this point, only the tennis courts can be viewed from the street

properties.name: The late Walt Disney's Former Home
properties.description: His house is located on the bend -behind a gate
